article_title: Quebec sees coronavirus cases soar, faces equipment shortage
article_description: With more than half of Canada s coronavirus cases  Quebec has become the country s epicenter for the pandemic and could run out of some equipment in a week after missing an early opportunity to control the outbreak
article_content: MONTREAL  Reuters    With more than half of Canada s coronavirus cases  Quebec has become the country s epicenter for the pandemic and could run out of some equipment in a week after missing an early opportunity to control the outbreak   The spring school br   3322 chars
